channel.title: France on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in France on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Vannes
item.description: Didn’t leave Chinon until 11:45 after the Obligatory Coffee with the Lyttles, called into the Camper Van dealer but it was closed for lunch. {{ more }} Stopped in McDonald’s for lunch and an emergency stop in Valet for Flo and once more at an Aire. We arrive 18:00 at the Flower Camping Le Conleau setup ate our tea walked Lotti, watched Ozark and bed. Still raining when we got up but very light.

item.title: Chinon
item.description: Arriving in Chinon Camping de L’ile Auger around 17:30 to a blistering hot 38c which was a surprise as I expected it to be cooler further north. St Martins {{ more }} Setup in a nice shaded spot, put out the tarp, had tea and then walked round the town and found a caf√© for desert. We slept late and after a leisurely breakfast we went for a walk around the old town.
